alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 5:38PM AKST until February 17 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow occurring. Snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Visibilities reduced to one half mile. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and worst visibilities are expected along the coast. By Friday morning, the main front will push north of the area and steady snow will turn to snow showers, which should allow visibility to gradually improve by the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
